name: JackQuest: The Tale of The Sword
name_original: JackQuest: The Tale of The Sword
description:
JackQuest: The Tale of The Sword is a retro styled 2d metroidvania with fast paced gameplay, charming pixel art, and an interesting storyline.
Control Jack, a smart adventurer and his special sword, Kuro.
Jack must rescue his loved one and break the terrible curse, face menacing enemies, and discover new secrets.
Find items that will give Jack new abilities so that he can complete his epic quest.
